name: SPYRAL Tough
effectText: This card's name becomes "SPYRAL Super Agent" while it is on the field or in the GY. Once per turn: You can declare 1 type of card (Monster, Spell, or Trap) and target 1 card your opponent controls; reveal the top card of your opponent's Deck, and if you do, destroy the targeted card if the revealed card is the declared type.
